settings.title: Materials
settings.content: Emma smoothly combines high-quality materials to create a dream-like mattress that conforms to every body type. Through the combination of our extensive research and advanced foam technology, Emma offers the comfiest sleep possible. Emma mattresses offer comfort point-elastic caving that enables an ideal and unique fit for your body. As a result, your spine stays straight while at the same time offering you the necessary amount of support and comfort.

settings.title: Certifications
settings.content: Our top-of-the-line foams are all CertiPUR-USÂ® certified, meaning, they are made without any ozone-depleting chemicals and safe from VOCs, formaldehyde, and phthalates.

settings.note: *For queen sizes only. All prices and information from public sources listed as of Sept 1, 2023. Information may not reflect updated prices and promotions.

settings.desc:
Enjoy the best value for premium comfort

  • 55% discount on our newest 13-inch Emma Hybrid Comfort
  • 55% discount on 2 Emma Original Adjustable Foam Pillows
  • 55% discount on our Emma Breathable Mattress Protector
settings.caption_content: We offer an excellent sleep system that ensures a perfect night's sleep.

settings.heading: Curves In All The Right Places
settings.content: Because you deserve better, we went beyond firmness and made sure we provide real 7-Zoned Support that helps ergonomically to align your head, shoulders, back, hips, and legs. The mattress adapts, curves & contours to the unique shape of every body.

settings.heading: Great Sleep Is No Sweat
settings.content: Made with breathable and cooling components from the inside-out: from Emma Sleepâ€™s unique edge-to-edge pocket spring technology, to our breezy AIRGOCELL Foam to our temperature-regulating UltraDry Cover. These all work together to enable maximum airflow and keep you sleeping comfortably through the night.

settings.heading: Undisturbed sleep with zero motion transfer
settings.content: Made with an open-celled foam that isolates motion, light sleepers can continue to snooze even as their partner tosses and turns in bed. The combined springs in the Hybrid Comfort also help hold the structure of the mattress during movement.

settings.heading: Developed by expertsÂ
settings.content: The Hybrid Comfort  was developed by a team of sleep experts and researchers, bringing top-notch technology to the USA. We know that the quality of your sleep is a long-term investment. Our products are built to last, having been tested and approved in our laboratories.

settings.title: Breathable and moisture-wicking Top cover
settings.content: The Emma cover is soft-to-touch, making it very comfortable to lie on. Built with light fibers, our cover wicks away moisture away and prevents heat from getting trapped on the surface.

settings.title: The Breezy AirgocellÂ® foam
settings.content: Our signature Point Elastic Airgocell technology absorbs and releases excess body heat and moisture, creating an ideal sleeping environment for peaceful sleep.

settings.title: The Cool foam layer that isolates motion
settings.content: Find comfort in any sleeping position. Memory foam molds to the unique shape of your body for even pressure distribution and provides great motion isolation so you can sleep undisturbed, even with a fussy partner

settings.title: The Supportive HRX foam
settings.content: Durable HRX foam supports you with just the right level of firmness, without hollows or bumps. Lie back and move freely until you've found your position for a deep sleep.

settings.title: The Ergonomic, 7-Zone edge-to-edge pocket springs
settings.content: Say goodbye to restless nights! Our individually-wrapped coils are designed to enhance airflow and provide the optimum level of tension and bounce all over the mattress â€” strong enough to support sleepers of all shape and size. Rest comfortably as our pocket springs adapt to your spine for longer and deeper restorative sleep.

settings.title: The Stabilizing layer
settings.content: Long-lasting mattresses need a good foundation. Our base is built to last, providing added stability for decades of quality sleep.

settings.title: The Resistant, anti-slip, lower cover with handles
settings.content: Innovative mattress lower cover, designed with exceptional durability and a convenient handle for effortless maneuverability.

settings.title: Sleeping will never be the same
settings.subtitle: Experience rave-worthy comfort on a mattress that suits your every sleep need

settings.title: How does the new Hybrid Comfort feel?
settings.subtitle: MATTRESS FIRMNESS SCALE
settings.description: On a 1-10 scale (soft to firm), the Hybrid Comfort mattress strikes an ideal equilibrium 5 (medium firm). This translates to experiencing the plush, cloud-like comfort of contemporary memory foam, all the while receiving precisely the necessary support to safeguard your back and hips as you enjoy a restful night's sleep.

settings.title: High-quality support for heavier sleepers!
settings.content: As a heavier sleeper, the Emma Climax provides excellent support for me, and i've been feeling sooo rejuvanated in the AMs. I love that I don't have to sleep on a rock (this one is both soft and supportive at the same time!) to feel like my mattress can keep me feeling solid.
settings.author: Katherine M.

settings.title: Staying cool and comfortable
settings.content: This purchase has helped a lot with my night sweats - said goodbye to my decades-old mattress and really happy with this one. 10/10
settings.author: Matthew R.

settings.title: The ultimate mattress for couples with different preferences!
settings.content: The hubby is a restless sleeper and tosses and turns a lot at night. I'm glad to report that I've been feeling less disruption through the night. The climax feels balanced and comfortable for us both.
settings.author: Sophia L.

settings.title: Great for couples
settings.content: We've tried orthopedic mattresses in the past, but returned it because they're TOO firm. I prefer soft ones, while my husband prefers firm. For some strange reason, this mattress just works for the both of us. His back pain's gone and I've been sleeping like a log every night!
settings.author: Donna C.

settings.title: Uninterrupted sleep all night
settings.content: This was recommended to me by my friend since I've been waking up in the middle of the night with my old mattress. So glad I listened cuz now I've been sleeping straight and waking up without a sweat
settings.author: Nicole W

settings.title: Best quality sleep I've ever had!
settings.content: I didn't realize how bad my previous mattress was until I received my Emma mattress. Not only do I sleep straight through the night (mind you, I sleep with my partner and dog and don't feel their movements at all!), I wake up energized and well rested. I no longer have any body aches and never feel too hot/too cold. Highly recommend!
settings.author: Jonathan W.

settings.title: Unbeatable value for exceptional quality!
settings.content: Crazy how we got such a steal at this price point. Seriously the most comfortable sleeping experience ever.
settings.author: Olivia K.

settings.title: I can't wait for bedtime now!
settings.content: Sharing a conventional mattress that is sagging, with a long legged whippet was a disaster - most mornings I fell out of bed with him pushing me out. I now wake up every morning with much less pain and even the dog seems to love it!
settings.author: Judy K.

settings.title: Best sleeping with Emma
settings.content: My wife and I love this mattress because we never wake up during sleeping time, and we don't get lower back pain after we wake up.
settings.author: James L.

settings.content: When we wake up to start our day, we feel recharged and ready to tackle our day! This mattress drastically changed our lives.

settings.content: The Emma Mattress ended up being the perfect choice for a hot sleeper who's allergic to dustmites like me! Got a cool memory foam layer to help protect against allergens.

settings.heading: Becca Dup
settings.content: My post-work-out naps have gotten 10x better with my new Emma Original Mattress. Here's to quality sleep!

settings.heading: Kay and Nesther Nomads
settings.content: We just can't get rid of our new Emma Mattress! It's so comfortable and we've very happy with this one!

settings.content: Our rest have improved since we used the Emma original mattress, we've been happily sleeping on them for the past 2 years! They're the real deal!

settings.title: Is it free to return your products?
settings.content:
It's 100% free to return your Emma! If your Emma turns out not to suit you for any reason, feel free to return it. Just simply get in contact with us via our chat support, phone or email and we will refund and collect it at no cost to you.


Live support is also available from 08:00 to 18:00 GMT-6, Monday-Friday!

settings.title: How does your 365-Night-Trial work?
settings.content:
Our risk-free 365-night trial means that you get a full year to decide if your Emma mattress is a good fit for you. This gives you more time to try the mattress for yourself and experience the benefits that our 4Million+ customers have come to enjoy each night!

Helpful Tip: We recommend you sleep on your Emma for at least 21 nights so that you and your body can get suited to your new Emma mattress.

You can begin your 365-night trial today. Our 0% APR financing with Affirm also gives you the option to make 12 equal payments over the next 12 months.

settings.title: Do you ship nationwide?
settings.content: We do offer free shipping in all the province in Canada.

settings.title: How long does shipping take?
settings.content: Our free shipping takes approximately 3-5 business days nationwide.
